name: ROBLOXVIP735 Vidlii Channel Theme
description:
Because SOME people want to see a channel theme everywhere. (Me because it looks ugly when my channel is a different color)
Based on ROBLOXVIP735's theme, which is based on Danooct1's September 9th 2009 theme.
obsoletion_message: Sorry, I ran into issues. I will undelete later when fixed.
additional_info:
For best sighting, use as a replacement logo:https://userstyles.org/styles/145998/vidlii-time-for-a-new-start
It's not a hundred percent perfect, and I plan to fix that eventually as I can.
V 1.2 Oversight Fix 8/5/2017 (Updated "Upload" page, "Inbox" page and the "Account" page by adding a lighter color in the background. Also attempted to fixed the "My Videos" screen.)
Note: V 1.2 only changes the "my_account" page, and not the others. I plan to fix that later, but as you can already tell, I'm lazy as hell.
V 1.1 Content Creator's update(fixed major problems with the "My Videos" and "My Channel" screen. Subscription screen now works. Miscellaneous changes to the "Videos" and "Channels" screen.
V 1.0:The screenshots
